content: This is so much more than just a tinted lip balm! It gives great color and stays on! I currently have super strawberry, but I have to get more colors. :)
Beautiful colors, and not drying at all. I had to reapply during the day, but it's not meant to stay on long term.

I bought this tinted lip balm in "Whole Lotta Honey"
I absolutely love it. It glides on and isn't sticky or gooey. This particular shade turned out to be very close to my natural lip color. Its my natural lips but better!! I will be purchasing this again, and I look forward to trying the other shades.
This is perfect for moisturize you lips !! And also to provide a little nut necessary color in your lips !! You can use this lipstick for every day !!
I love the chubby lip colors that have been coming out lately. This one is especially nice. The color is quite sheer, and stays on a long time. I have just ordered another color.
title: More than just a tinted lip balm!
awesome!
Lovely
The name tells you everything
New favorite!

name: Chubby Stick Moisturizing Lip Colour Balm
